desc: The store for Gulliver's 47 English Single Malt Whisky from Samuel Gulliver & Co. A business first founded in 1747 for adventurous spirits and now an award-winning bottler of the finest English single malt in the world.

layout.text:
SAMUEL GULLIVER WAS AN ADVENTUROUS SPIRIT
Samuel Gulliver took inspiration from his fictional namesake to travel the world and in so doing he became a connoisseur of the best spirits around the globe. To share his passion with the world he established his business in The White Horse, Banbury, England in 1747

THE OFFICIAL WHISKY OF ENGLAND RUGBY
Samuel Gulliver & Co. are proud to work with the RFU, whom have wonderful history dating back to 1871, to launch The Official Whisky of England Rugby - 'England's No.6', an ode to the best ever blindside flankers to grace the field for England. Like this fine 6yr old inaugural release, No.6's are all about disrupting the play, tackling (the taste buds) and great handling skills (in the cask).
EXPLORE THE OFFICIAL WHISKY OF ENGLAND RUGBY
